Text: This Rad Studio Includes Delphi & C++, Sadly no RADPHP or Prism....
Yep, works like a charm. Beware of activator number 2, there is a trojan in there.
which trojan in activator 2? tried activator 1, but didn't work.

Sorry, I misread MSE alert, activator #2 falls into the category of "HackTool:Win32/Keygen".

Steps for activator 1:
- Copy files bdsreg.exe, cglm.ini, msimg32.dll, sanctuarylib.dll into RAD Studio XE2 installation path. Yes, overwrite existing ones.
- Run activator.exe, press 'Active' button, wait for confirmation window, and finally press 'Run XE2' button. Easy as that.
Works nicely, just use activator 1, no need to copy any files.
Many thanks to the uploader and the cracker!
Well, that's fine, Ń ouldn't be better
When I try and install the program I get an error saying "cannot start setup - setup file may be corrupt or you may have the wrong password." Has anyone got any possible solutions to this?

The Download woked great - but the Installer did't: It thows the Error  >"" is not a valid integer value< before the installpromt already comes up. And the Promt is unaccessable due to an Memomryaccess-Error... I tried it with an other XE-Setup, the same failure!
Needing yor help, please !

Those who are getting..." is not a valid integer

A method to workaround this issue is to run setup.exe in the install sub-folder on the DVD or in the extracted ESD folder instead of install_RADStudio.exe. Then follow the steps in the installation wizard to install the product.
